talk.author: did:plc:yddfcdhhinii6fj6hyulnzpk
talk.utter: This is the best twitter alternative I’ve found so far, and I’ve been glad to rebuild my following on here, but if people don’t want to be on here it immediately becomes useless to me.

talk.author: did:plc:ffxek7sgbpe32krja5s2tzpw
talk.utter: I'm so incredibly frustrated that I feel like I've been here a week and there's a revolt because it grew to the point where they have to institute policy and they are refusing

talk.author: did:plc:yddfcdhhinii6fj6hyulnzpk
talk.utter: There’s 300k users at this point and they deliberately escalated giving out invites to capture the twitter exodus. It’s unreasonable at this point to not have clear policy on what is or isn’t allowed. Ideally, that happens BEFORE mad heads show up.

talk.author: did:plc:yddfcdhhinii6fj6hyulnzpk
